entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this morning then cloudy. Flurries over the Highlands. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over the Highlands. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023
